info.name: AI Itinerary Planner - Google Gemini
info.description: Collection for generating travel itineraries using Google Gemini API

item.name: Generate Itinerary (Direct Gemini Call)
item.description: Call Google Gemini API directly. Replace YOUR_GOOGLE_GEMINI_API_KEY with your actual API key.

item.name: Generate Itinerary (Via Local Server)
item.description: Call the local Express server endpoint. Server must be running with GOOGLE_GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable set.

item.name: Health Check
item.description: Check if the server is running
